website_summaries.verdict: This steel muddler is designed with all of the quality you'd expect from an OXO kitchen product.
pros: Nonslip grip handle allows you to use more force when muddling
Nylon head is strong but gentle on glass
Long pointed teeth effectively release juices and oils from fruits and herbs
Long handle allows you to muddle comfortably in most glasses or shakers
cons: Traces of fruit and spices can get stuck in the deep grooves between the teeth

customer_reviews.title: Needs more aggresive 'teeth' for muddling
customer_reviews.text: Top marks for quality and easy grip, but the 'teeth' on the bottom of this muddler will not help you tear into much...fine for crushing sugar cubes and releasing a bit of oil from citrus skins, but probably won't get the job done for something like mint leaves, at least not 'in the glass'. I make a lot of Caipirinhas, and use this for the demerara sugar, but usually wind of juicing the limes separately--it's easier to use a hand-press than this muddler, which is a bit disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: I.R.M.

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job. Oxo brand won't disapoint you.
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for a muddler and spent quite some time comparing the wooden ones and the metal ones... After reading a lot of reviews I decided for a metal one... and oxo got my vote. I already used it several times to squeeze some orange slices and mint leaves to add to my water.... and I can share that the water was never flavored as much before. You will get the extra $ in flavor. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Chevalier Defrenne

customer_reviews.title: Great Muddler!
customer_reviews.text: A great handy tool for muddling mint leaves for mojitos! It is easy to use & handle. I would hand wash this tool, not put in the top rack of a D/W. I haven’t put into a D/W because I am afraid of the rubber/silicone degradating with the dryer heat. Thanks for a nice handy product for our home bar.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B.

customer_reviews.title: Solid Muddler Well Designed
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for muddling citrus and herbs. The broad surface at either end of the shaft helps to deliver the proper energy. The length is right for a tall shaker can. Basil-Lemontinis successfully tested!!
customer_reviews.author: Ken H.

customer_reviews.title: Great - would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kitchen tool for summer time drinks. It is a little tricky to clean completely, but not too much to warrant a star being taken away. Would purchase again as a gift for others.
customer_reviews.author: Missb

customer_reviews.title: Works well and comfortable to use
customer_reviews.text: Being metal, in addition to it being sturdy, the working end is sharply defined and hard so it does a great job of actually muddling. The other end has a soft rounded surface so it's very comfortable in your palm and you can apply pressure and twist easily. Also it's length is good for working in deeper vessels. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Will D

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement muddler. I think it is awesome. I first used to to smash avocados for gucamole and it did an excellent job. It is easy to clean and it doesn't slip out of your hand. Muddles mint for mojios well also. It is an all around great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Wright

customer_reviews.title: Way Better
customer_reviews.text: This Oxo muddler is much better than the wooden muddler recommend by America’s Test Kitchen. Like others stated, the wooden one splits Immediately and won’t last. Buy the Oxo muddler!
customer_reviews.author: Chris T

customer_reviews.title: Love this Muddler
customer_reviews.text: I love OXO products and this muddler is not exception. It cleans up nicely and does a great job muddling my mojitos!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara J Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Decent Value
customer_reviews.text: I suppose it does what it's meant to do, but I did not purchase this for bar drinks
customer_reviews.author: sharon schneider

customer_reviews.title: Great bar tool
customer_reviews.text: Mulls lines and mint with ease. Very easy to use and the groves on the bottom really do all the work. Great tool.
customer_reviews.author: dcbevents

customer_reviews.title: but it works great for mashing bananas
customer_reviews.text: I use this to mash food for my toddler. It travels well. I know that's not what it's designed for, but it works great for mashing bananas, avocados, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Shari Harley

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 uses
customer_reviews.text: The metal cap on one end fell off almost immediately. Tried contacting customer support for a replacement and it's impossible to get a hold of anyone. I used to love OXO products, but they just lost a customer.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Bigger is Better
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. No more bruised knuckles from the glass.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: AND is well made with a comfortable grip and nice and sturdy construction
customer_reviews.text: This works just as it needs to...AND is well made with a comfortable grip and nice and sturdy construction. Love the OXO designs!
customer_reviews.author: M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: Both for my husband who bartend, excellent quality and price
customer_reviews.author: virginia desmond

customer_reviews.title: This one is a keeper!
customer_reviews.text: This is my thired muddler and while it's just a muddler, I find this one to be the most effective for Mojitos and other drinks that require muddling. It's comfortable, strong and does a good job of doing what it was made to do. I can always count on OXO to give the very best. Very satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: G. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Great muddler
customer_reviews.text: Works great, just like every other OXO item we own.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great convenient shape and high quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient shape and good quality. I used to have a lot of muddlers of different shapes and materials. Now this one is the best for me. Flat top is very convenient. If it would be a bit bigger it could even mash a potato :-)
customer_reviews.author: Anton Eine

customer_reviews.title: It does its job
customer_reviews.text: Muddlers aren’t complicated. I wanted something functional, durable, comfortable, and easy to clean, that wouldn’t damage the vessels the muddling was done in. This works.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Works as anticipated
customer_reviews.text: Does the trick for what I need (making homemade "vitamin" fruit water in mason jars). Not crazy about the price, since there are cheaper Muddler's on the market, but this thing has been sturdy and reliable every single time I've used it. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Christian E

customer_reviews.title: Great muddler
customer_reviews.text: I bought this muddler for my husband to make Old Fashions and he loves it. It looks cool and has a sleek design. The bottom has a wide base making it easy to crush fruit. The handle is very comfortable to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Jackson

customer_reviews.title: durable and gets the job done for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: High quality, durable and gets the job done for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Franco Caliz-aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The perfect product. I use it mainly to make caipirinhas.
customer_reviews.author: Anita85

customer_reviews.title: ~very handy~
customer_reviews.text: this is such a good quality product. never used one before this and I really really like it. i used it to make guacamole and it was perfect for that. I also used it to release the flavor from ginger and it worked well there also.
customer_reviews.author: Empress

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this muddler. One of the best that I've had. I love that the head is made out of nylon instead of metal. Really comfortable to use!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: it great it gets the job done and it hasn't broke and i have already broke it in quite well and i am a very strong person and if i havent snapped it you shouldn't be able, to unless you use it wrong. but it works and its dependable.
customer_reviews.author: ravi

customer_reviews.title: Great Muddler
customer_reviews.text: I love this muddler, I have bought two or three because I like it so much. It smashes as it should and cleans up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: C Toth

customer_reviews.title: Killer product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, lightweight, wide surface, tall enough for muddling in a tin, wide face, durable, comfortable in your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Outland

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Solid muddler that is long enough to use in a standard size shaker.
customer_reviews.author: MAI-TRAM NGUYEN

customer_reviews.title: nice looking, but first one fell apart within 1 second of using
customer_reviews.text: Just a note; my first one literally broke into two pieces at the handle/shaft junction. I had put some sugar and a slice of lime in a collins glass, and as I began to apply pressure with the muddle, it fell to pieces. I requested a replacement, hoping the first was bad luck. If the second falls apart too, you'll be sure to read about it here.
customer_reviews.author: T. Shehan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my kitchen tools. Not sure how I lived so long without one.
customer_reviews.author: LucyDog

customer_reviews.title: nice & long so you can muddle directly into the ...
customer_reviews.text: If you are a bar tender, then this is the one you want, nice & long so you can muddle directly into the mixing cup with a great grip.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: bigger and heavier than expected - too big for a small amount of herbs
customer_reviews.author: Frances Terry

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This product works great and gets the job done. I use it to make mojitos at home. I picked this one over others for the handle. Makes it more comfortable to use if you're making a lot of drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: This is a high quality tool
customer_reviews.text: We really love this muddler. It has a nice weight to it and a substantial feel in your hand. Plus the muddling end has these little points on it that are great at releasing the oils from the citrus peels.
customer_reviews.author: kunzie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love the feel and crushes the way you would expect.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S. Forsythe

customer_reviews.title: It does the job, but the muddling end has ...
customer_reviews.text: It does the job, but the muddling end has a textured finish and it's difficult to get everything our of the grooves without touching it.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Nice and long dont hit my knuckles when I'm muddling.
customer_reviews.author: LINDSAY

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: It looks like the picture and it does the job. I use it to make fruit infused waters in mason jars. I just need to press down a little bit. And u will fell totally cool when u are using it!!
customer_reviews.author: Sublime

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works really well! I also used it to mash potatoes when I didn't have a potato masher for Thanksgiving!!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Kim

customer_reviews.title: These work great for making caipirinha's and mojitos at my restaurant
customer_reviews.text: These work great for making caipirinha's and mojitos at my restaurant, but doesn't earn 5 stars because the top fell off after 3 weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: old fashion
customer_reviews.text: matches our other oxo cocktail stuff! hubby got it to make old fashion (inspired by mad man) and he loves it. dishwasher safe (top rack)!
customer_reviews.author: cookie

customer_reviews.title: Bar muddler
customer_reviews.text: The best muddler for a real craft bar. Easy to work with, and it really muddles well but, I've noticed in all the ones I've used, that the top cap of it comes off. Not making it unusable but I've found it to be a consistent problem with this tool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Works Great, comfortable to use and cleans easily in dishwasher. I use it primarily to make Mojitos and I like the rubber bottom that doesn't harm the glass when muddling.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is much higher quality than I had expected. It has a lot of heft and 2 types of tips. I look forward to lots of fun drinks this summer with the help of this muddler.
customer_reviews.author: Picky

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Great value, totally works when muddling my ingredients for cocktails, does not slip like the one i had before so all in all very happy!
customer_reviews.author: veronica

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great muddler. Used to mush fruits for cocktails. Works as expected nothing fancy. I would recommend to anyone that needs a muddler.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Hulk Mash! (& muddle)
customer_reviews.text: Hulk use spatula handle to mash fruit, hulk angry. Hulk use Oxo muddler to mash oranges & cherries, hulk like.
customer_reviews.author: Nbot

customer_reviews.title: Very very good
customer_reviews.text: works fantastic. I just wish it were slightly longer. From time to time I hit my knuckle on the mixing Tin
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect tool for a perfect mojito! I can definitely tell a difference! Works great, very well made! Can't believe I waited so long to buy one!
customer_reviews.author: D. V. Moye

customer_reviews.title: another good oxo product
customer_reviews.text: great weight & design. the rubberized parts make it much more pleasant to use. i wouldn't use it for guacamole if you like yours chunky. its amazing for drinks.
customer_reviews.author: sneakyright

customer_reviews.title: Gifted - Buddy Loved it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my friend whom really liked Mojitos. Last I talked to him, he still uses this one almost every time he makes them now.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Hipius

customer_reviews.title: Stock your bar with quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make the Brazilian caipirinha. With this muddler, you can really crush your lime with substantial force to release the juices from the lime and the oils from its skin. The handle allows you to use significant force while remaining comfortable to use and the nylon end protects your glass from damage. I would recommend this as a replacement for any wodden muddler. Helpful? Click yes Questions? Comment below
customer_reviews.author: R. Fortin

customer_reviews.title: Great muddler
customer_reviews.text: Love this muddler. We enjoy using it for our mint in our mojito's. Also works great to make homemade margaritas and muddle the limes.
customer_reviews.author: TandJ

customer_reviews.title: Muddler unmuddled the gift  list!
customer_reviews.text: My son-in-law listed it on his Amazon gift wish listl, whiich I always appreciate. OXO products can always be trusted, and price is reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: ann parks

customer_reviews.title: Love this for fermenting
customer_reviews.text: Love this for fermenting. When I make kraut it helps having this to mash the cabbage to make lots of brine.
customer_reviews.author: Lasan Jamay

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Great product from a great company! Simple to use...simple to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Starr

customer_reviews.title: excellent product and price
customer_reviews.text: Paid around $13. Nice to muddle without concern of splinters. Rubber head helps with gripping limes and lemons during process. Helps make drinks - what's not to like.
customer_reviews.author: Mark H

customer_reviews.title: Great Place For This Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Gave it as a gift - the bartender loved it
customer_reviews.author: BIG AL

customer_reviews.title: It will have you doing the mojito mambo
customer_reviews.text: The OXO Steel Muddler is one of my favorite bar tools! i love a good mojito and this Muddler makes it a breeze. The design fits in the hand well and the construction is immaculate. It has enough weight to it to get the job done. The plastic nubs don't wear down and cause no damage to delicate glassware. I use it to muddle mint leaves and sugar nearly weekly and have found no drawbacks to this great product. Adding to the 5 stars is the fact it is dishwasher safe. Simply throw it into the dishwasher when the guests leave and skip worrying about doing the dishes!
customer_reviews.author: WSUSHOX22

customer_reviews.title: Timely
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift and I assume everything was good.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope

customer_reviews.title: Excellent muddler. Nice grip
customer_reviews.text: Excellent muddler. Nice grip. Easy to clean. Good price. Nice length for any glass you would be using. Rubber tip is easier on your glassware.
customer_reviews.author: Bill C

customer_reviews.title: Great muddler.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent tool for muddling berries, mint, and other fruits. The handle is comfortable and the shaft is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Biggs

customer_reviews.title: Great Muddler
customer_reviews.text: OXO makes some good products with great build quality and their muddler does not disappoint. It is made from steel and has a really solid feel. The only reason I did not give a 5-star is because I wish is was bigger and a bit heavier. When you are mashing cocktails you want the most inertia possible, the pictures makes it look bigger than it is. Overall no major complaints, a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: E. M.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy muddler
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy duty muddler. I use it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Cate A

customer_reviews.title: Oxo Quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product. It's a muddler but the rubber bottom is a good idea.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: It does the trick. I put in the lie wedges, the mint leaves and crush ice. I use the muddler to muddle the ingredient together.
customer_reviews.author: Tapoli

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and has a quality feel
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Looks good and has a quality feel.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous product that I use to muddle my ginger for my new homemade "Moscow Mule". I would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Laura c.

customer_reviews.title: OXO Stainless steel muddler
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool for making the most wonderful mojitos!!! Crushes the limes and mint perfectly....and easy to clean!!
customer_reviews.author: generalpud

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: This muddler is easy to use and really does the job! It fits easily in the palm of your hand. Just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it, great buy, use it for muddling, and even my kids love muddling with it
customer_reviews.author: D. Devani

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best meddlers I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best meddlers I have ever used! Which says a lot because I once owed a bar!
customer_reviews.author: PamC

customer_reviews.title: Great muddler
customer_reviews.text: Fits the hand well and is a really good length to reach to the bottom of cocktail shaker. Would buy this product again without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: GourmetGoddess

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for mint juleps and mojitos
customer_reviews.text: Sent as a gift-- my hostess who was the recipient loves it. "It works so much better than the honey dripper!"
customer_reviews.author: Picolinda

customer_reviews.title: Not many decent muddlers at retail stores
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Could not find a good quality muddler at big box stores.
customer_reviews.author: Wilbur

customer_reviews.title: Perfect muddler.
customer_reviews.text: the muddler is so rigid and firm and you can do alot of mojitos and enjoy prefect smaching, buy it
customer_reviews.author: Arch

customer_reviews.title: Great Muddler
customer_reviews.text: We are just starting our home bar and needed a muddler to round out our supplies. This is very clean and classy and even works to mash avocados for guacumole!
customer_reviews.author: L Williams

customer_reviews.title: Another OXO winner
customer_reviews.text: Hands-down the best muddler I've ever used. I find it easier to clean (and probably more hygenic) than a wooden one. Works great for Mojitos, Caipirinhas, Old Fashioneds, etc. Also does a great job with Guacamole!
customer_reviews.author: Jupiter Jones

customer_reviews.title: mojito-rific!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome muddler. wife and I had been using the end of a small wooden rolling pin to muddle mint for mojitos, this muddler has seriously improved the quality of our mixed drinks. the "waffle textured" squares does a great job of smooshing the mint without creating a lot of little green floaties. Great muddler!
customer_reviews.author: HandsomeRyan

customer_reviews.title: Muddle in to something.
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Has a fantastic handle. Washes extremely easily. Dishwasher safe. If your looking for a good muddle tool, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: paul fink

customer_reviews.title: Muddle On
customer_reviews.text: Ergonomic, easy to clean, doesn't stain and has a classic look.
customer_reviews.author: haggisman

customer_reviews.title: Professional muddler.
customer_reviews.text: Very good muddler. Good grip. Will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: tink

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great heft, easy to hold and easy to use. Looks nice too. Probably lots like it, but I'm happy with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. R. King

customer_reviews.title: Muddles!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and gets the job done. Doesn't feel flimsy like some others I've come across. No complaints at all! Great.
customer_reviews.author: DHayes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Great feel, very weighty and sturdy. Handle is comfortable and the length is perfect for a highball glass. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great muddler for Mojitos!
customer_reviews.text: This tool bruises the mint leaves quickly and easily for mojitos. I also use it to squeeze juice from the lime wedge in the bottom of the glass. Sure the beats the end of a wooden spoon I was using!
customer_reviews.author: TAH

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is a great muddler. If the tip was just slightly bigger in diameter it would be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: M Pat

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: What can go wrong with a muddler? This works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Julie norris

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as shown
customer_reviews.text: This is a very low maintenance muddler - came as expected and is easy to use and can be thrown in the dishwasher for easy cleanup! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: CT Piano

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the other reviews here. Today I dropped it and the metal cap broke off. Too bad because it's the perfect shape and worked well otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: jj avery

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: the serrated face makes quick work of muddling mint leaves and lime for Mojitos. A truly great kitchen / bar tool!
customer_reviews.author: Harold Siegert

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job Well!
customer_reviews.text: I like this muddler better than others on the market because of the product materials. Wood is not as hygienic and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: MJB

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Solid, tall enough for any glass. Went with the steel and rubber rather than wood. Wood will stain and get gross with time.
customer_reviews.author: SLW

customer_reviews.title: Quality Addition To Your Home Bar
customer_reviews.text: Item is just as described. It's a quality muddler that holds up well and will last for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Yoga Love

customer_reviews.title: this is best muddler i've ever used
customer_reviews.text: i mix a lot of cocktails. this is best muddler i've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: karpb

customer_reviews.title: Get this!
customer_reviews.text: I started with a wood muddler, which cracked immediately even with proper care. I had read this type might over-muddle/crush delicate herbs. I find it's perfect, however. I like to muddle fruits and herbs for my cocktails (usually basil and mint, citrus fruits and melon), and this is so great for that - much better than the wood muddle I originally tried and had to return.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wing

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Nice muddler. Long handle allows for muddling in shaker. No issues so far. Seems to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: Comfy in the hand, looks good, and crushes things up nicely, what more do you want. I also love the long handle, it lets me get down into deep shakers and not worry about it.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Rogerson

product_meta.title: OXO SteeL Muddler with Non-Scratch Nylon Head and Soft Non-Slip Grip, Silver, 9-Inch
product_meta.description: Style Name:MuddlerThe OXO SteeL Muddler crushes mint and citrus fruits for mojitos, caipirinhas, mint juleps and more. Sturdy, die-cast zinc provides years of use, and a nylon head protects glasses. A soft, comfortable grip makes the Muddler easy to hold and easy to use. Cheers.
feature_bullets: Sturdy, die-cast zinc with a nylon head to protect glasses

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars656 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
